I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.

participant_2.background:
My cats are my family, and I don't know what I would do without them.
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike.
i love eating kale.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I'm excited to start practicing my makeup for my new cosplay costume!
Oh that's awesome! What are you going to be cosplaying as?
I'm going to be cosplaying as Sailor Moon!
Oh that's so cool! I've always wanted to cosplay as a character from Sailor Moon, but I've never had the time to learn how to do the makeup.
It's not that hard, there are lots of tutorials online!
Oh that's good to know! I'll have to check them out.
You should! It's a lot of fun to get into character and dress up as your favorite anime character.
I know, it looks like a lot of fun!
Yeah it is! I love getting into character and acting out scenes from my favorite anime.
That's awesome! I wish I had more time to do stuff like that.
You should make some time! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
